coded_answer.p: I am writing in order to give you some further information that you enquiredrequired for the Camp California.
First of all, I would like to travel only in July due to my work commitment. I am allowed to take holiday onlyonly allowed to take holiday in July.
Concerning accommodation, I would prefer to stay in log cabins. Log cabins are bigger, more stable and usually more comfortable than tents.

As requested, I have choosedchosen two activities - sailing and surfing. I am quite experienced inat surfing - I have participated in some competitions - whereas I am not at all experienced inat sailing.

I would like know if I need any particular clothes or if there could be any extra expenses for the camp. Also, I would like to know if there is going to be a qualified instructor for activities since I am a beginningbeginner inat sailing as mentioned before.
I look forward to hearing from you.
How are you? Thanks for your last letter. It was great to hear from you.
I'm sorry I haven't written before, but as you know, I've been very busy because I was helping at a pop concert last month.

I have thoroughly enjoyed the experience. I helped people setting up and decorating the concert hall which was great help for my major subject - You know that my subject is design. I also had to distribute the flyers.

What I particularly enjoyed was meeting the famous musicians I have been dreaming of to seeseeing. The day I shakedshook their hands, I thoughthought I was over the moon! I will never forget that day.
